```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
# Paket aktivieren
library(readODS)
library(here)
```

```{r}
daten_in <- read_csv(here::here("daten/raw/ts-x-15.02.04.04_detail (2).csv")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  spec()
```

```{r}

# ods-Datei ".ods" importieren
daten_ods <- read_ods("daten/raw/ts-x-15.02.04.04_detail-APPENDIX.ods", sheet = "SEX") |> 
  select(CODE, LABEL_DE)
```

```{r}
# daten transformation

daten_in |> 
  left_join(daten_ods, by = c("sex" = "CODE")) 
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = daten_in,
       mapping = aes(x = "sex",
                     y = "period") +
         geom_bar())
```
